Class PhidgetsMessageSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • PhidgetsMessageSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.esotericsoftware.kryo.KryoSerializable, IMessageSender, java.io.Serializable

    public class PhidgetsMessageSender
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMessageSender, com.esotericsoftware.kryo.KryoSerializable, java.io.Serializable
    Represents an individual output in a PhidgetsModule.
    Author:
    Christopher Crabtree
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addMessageListener

        public void addMessageListener(java.lang.Object listener)
                        throws java.lang.ClassCastException
        Add the listener to the outputs list of listeners.
        Specified by:
        addMessageListener in interface IMessageSender
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to add.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - Thrown if the listener passed in is incompatible with this sender i.e. the listener expects a different type of message than this sender emits.

      • send

        public void send(com.phidgets.event.SensorChangeEvent sce)
        Convert the SensorChangeEvent to a sensor message (of type MessageSensor) and send to the output's list of listeners.
        Parameters:
        sce - The SensorChangeEvent to convert to a sensor message and send.
